scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway tmclennan/gateway && docker push tmclennan/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket . && docker tag websocket tmclennan/websocket && docker push tmclennan/websocket
scripts.build-messanger: docker build -f messanger.Dockerfile -t messanger . && docker tag messanger tmclennan/messanger && docker push tmclennan/messanger
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f frontend.Dockerfile -t react . && docker tag react tmclennan/react && docker push tmclennan/react
scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
